meanings.definition: To change the marketing image or identity of a product or company.
meanings.sent1: The company rebranded its logo to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to rebrand its packaging to appeal to a younger audience.
meanings.sent3: After the rebranding, the product looked so different that customers were surprised.
meanings.sent4: The rebranded product emerged like a butterfly from its old cocoon.
meanings.sent5: The rebranding of the company was like a fresh coat of paint, making everything new and exciting.

meanings.definition: To give a new name, design, or image to a product or company.
meanings.sent1: She rebranded her clothing line with a more modern aesthetic.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant rebranded itself with a sleek new logo and menu.
meanings.sent3: The rebranded product stood out on the shelves with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The old store was rebranded into a trendy boutique, attracting a younger crowd.
meanings.sent5: The rebranding of the company breathed new life into its outdated image.
